description:
Managing the performance of an employee is one of the essential parts of being a leader and manager. This course shows a strategic, cohesive and integrated way to assess, improve and reward performance.

Specifically, the course covers

1. Different steps in an effective performance management process - by giving a well tested and tried framework.

2. Explains effective ways to manage low performance and motivate high performance.

3. Covers in detail ways to conduct an effective performance discussion - including specific communication techniques.

This course will take about 35 minutes to complete. At the end of it, you will have plenty of ideas on ways to effectively manage the performance of your teams and become a successful leader at your workplace.
title: Employee Performance Management
